clinical_study.brief_title: Improve Compliance in Automated Peritoneal Dialysis Machine With SHARESOURCE
clinical_study.official_title: The Impact of Telemonitoring on Compliance and Outcomes of Patients Undergoing Automated Peritoneal Dialysis With SHARESOURCE

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to investigate the non-compliance rate of patients undergoing automated peritoneal dialysis by using automated peritoneal dialysis with SHARESOURCE software, and to evaluate if telemonitoring can improve peritoneal dialysis compliance and outcomes in the observation period.

detailed_description.textblock:
The non-compliance of patients receiving automated peritoneal dialysis (APD) is around 10-20%, and was believed to be under-estimated. Recently, a two-way telehealth system, SHARESOURCE software, provide practitioners real-time monitoring and recording of the therapy of APD.
By using this APD with SHARESOURCE software, we want to investigate the non-compliance rate of patients undergoing automated peritoneal dialysis, want to see if it can improve peritoneal dialysis compliance and outcomes in the observation period.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: use automated peritoneal dialysis machine without SHARESOURCE for 12 weeks, then use automated peritoneal dialysis machine with SHARESOURCE for 12 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Change of baseline patients' non-compliance rate at 3 months
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline(between week 0 and 12) and 3 months(week 12 and week 24)
primary_outcome.description: Non compliance rate was calculated by the days of non-compliance divided by days of APD therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of baseline peritoneal dialysis adequacy at 3 and 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Dialysis adequacy is to see if dialysis is enough

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of baseline uremic toxin level at 3 and 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: concentration of uremic toxins(ex: indoxyl sulfate, and p-cresyl sulfate)
body composition exam (Body Composition Monitor, Fresenius Medical Care, Bad Homburg, Germany) will be done
calculate the number of peritonitis rate
calculate the number of hospitalization rate

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline(between week 0 and 12) and 3 months(week 12 and week 24)
secondary_outcome.description: the telephone contact frequency (from patient to nurse) for peritoneal dialysis-related problems will be collected

intervention.intervention_name: HomeChoice Claria APD machine with SHARESOURCE
intervention.description: HomeChoice Claria APD machine with SHARESOURCE software. SHARESOURCE is a software can telemonitor patients' compliance

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- stable received peritoneal dialysis for over 1 year. Use automated peritoneal dialysis machine regularly by him/herself.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Acute hospitalization events due to acute coronary syndrome, stroke, heart failure, liver cirrhosis, systemic infection in 1 month.
- Life expectancy <1 year
- Peritoneal dialysis prescriptions will be scheduled or expected to change in 3 months
